title: '$50 billion in assets, but Blackstone is still getting started in India'
description: Blackstone is the largest owner and operator of office properties in India with an office portfolio of 135 million sq ft across 48 assets in seven key cities. The global investment major will continue to invest in office properties here besides increasing investments in new segments such as hospitality, data centres and warehousing.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
